楤字的基本解释

楤
sǒng
〔楤木〕落叶灌木或乔木，茎无枝，有大刺，果实近球形，树皮可入药。亦称“鹊不踏”。

楤
cōng
尖头担，用以挑柴草捆。

楤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǒng］
［《集韻》損動切，上蕫，心。］
亦作“棇1”。亦作“樬1”。
木名。楤木。落叶灌木或小乔木。树干生有大小针刺。叶互生，二至三回奇数羽状复叶。夏季开白色小花。果实近球形，紫黑色。产于我国中部。树皮、根皮可入药。
[②]［cōng］
［《廣韻》倉紅切，平東，清。］
尖头扁担。

楤字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楤； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页540第16
同棇。

楤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
楤字的起名意思

暂无。

Tree
Basic explanation of words
Tree
sǒng
[Aralia] Deciduous shrubs or trees, stems without branches, large thorns, fruits are nearly spherical, and the bark can be used as medicine. Also known as "the magpie does not step on".
Tree
cōng
Pointed shoulder, used to pick firewood bales.
Tree
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sǒng］
["Ji Yun" loss of moving cut, stirrup, heart. ]
Also known as "棇1". Also known as "樬1".
Wooden name. Aralia. Deciduous shrubs or small trees. The trunk has large and small needles. The leaves are alternate, two to three times with odd pinnately compound leaves. Small white flowers bloom in summer. The fruit is nearly spherical, purple and black. Produced in central my country. Bark and root bark can be used as medicine.
[②]［cōng］
["Guangyun" Canghongqie, Pingdong, Qing. ]
Pointed pole.
Tree
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　楤; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 540 16
The same.
